trans-unit.source: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> databases create one file per table or index. Some operating systems limit the number of files an application can open at one time.

seg-source.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> databases create one file per table or index.
Some operating systems limit the number of files an application can open at one time.

target.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> databases create one file per table or index.
Some operating systems limit the number of files an application can open at one time.

trans-unit.source: indicating need to relax file descriptors limit

seg-source.mrk: indicating need to relax file descriptors limit

target.mrk: indicating need to relax file descriptors limit

trans-unit.source: If the default is a low number, such as 64, you might run into unexpected IOExceptions (wrapped in SQLExceptions). If your operating system lets you configure the number of file descriptors, set this number to a higher value.

seg-source.mrk: If the default is a low number, such as 64, you might run into unexpected IOExceptions (wrapped in SQLExceptions).
If your operating system lets you configure the number of file descriptors, set this number to a higher value.

target.mrk: If the default is a low number, such as 64, you might run into unexpected IOExceptions (wrapped in SQLExceptions).
If your operating system lets you configure the number of file descriptors, set this number to a higher value.
